ActionBar_NewFolderCmd.Title: New Bookmark Folder
ActionBar_NewFolderCmd.LongHelp:
Select Bookmark Folder section and click this command to create a Bookmark Root Folder.

Select an existing Bookmark Folder in the tree and click this command to create a Bookmark Folder under the selected Bookmark Folder.
RemoveContent.Title: Remove
RemoveContent.ShortHelp: Removes the selected content from the Bookmark Folder.
RemoveContent.LongHelp: From the Bookmark Folder, select one or more objects and click this command to remove the selected content.
AddExistingContent.Title: Add Existing Content
AddExistingContent.ShortHelp: Adds content to the Bookmark Folder.
AddExistingContent.LongHelp:
Click this command and enter a query in the dialog box to search for the required content.

Select the required content and click OK to add the content to the selected Bookmark Folder.
AddExternalLink.Title: Add Link
AddExternalLink.ShortHelp: Adds External URL to the Bookmark Folder.
AddExternalLink.LongHelp:
Click this command and copy the required URL in the dialog box.

click OK to add this External URL as content to the selected Bookmark Folder.
OpenExternalLink.Title: Open Link
OpenExternalLink.ShortHelp: Open External link in the browser.
OpenExternalLink.LongHelp: Open External link in the browser from currently linked Bookmark Folder.
AddToFavorites.Title: Add/Remove to/from Favorites
AddToFavorites.ShortHelp: Adds or removes Bookmark Folders categorized as favorite.
AddToFavorites.LongHelp:
Select a Bookmark Folder in the tree section and click this command to add the Bookmark Folder as favorite.

From the favorites or the Bookmark Folder section, select a Bookmark Folder marked as favorite and click this command to remove it from favorites.
Cut.Title: Cut
Cut.ShortHelp: Cuts the selected content to the clipboard so you can paste elsewhere in Bookmark Folder Editor.
Copy.Title: Copy
Copy.ShortHelp: Copies the selected content to the clipboard so you can paste elsewhere in Bookmark Folder Editor.
Paste.Title: Paste
Paste.ShortHelp: Pastes the copied or cut content in the Bookmark Folder.
Paste.LongHelp: Paste creates an instance of the selected content. If you are copying a bookmark, you can either paste as duplicate or as a shortcut.
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.Title: Replace By Latest Revision
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces the selected content by its latest Revision.
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.LongHelp: Select one or more objects in the content view in the Bookmark Folder and click the command to replace the selected content by its latest revision.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.Title: Replace By Revision
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces the selected content by one of its revisions.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.LongHelp: Select a content in content view in the Bookmark Folder and click this command. From the Replace By Revision panel, select the required revision to replace the selected content in the content view by its revision.
AddFile.Title: Upload
AddFile.ShortHelp: Uploads a file to the selected Bookmark Folder.
AddFile.LongHelp: Click the command, select single or multiple files and click OK in the dialog box to upload the files in the Bookmark Folder.
DownloadFile.Title: Download
DownloadFile.ShortHelp: Downloads the document and its associated files. If multiple files are selected, they are downloaded as a ZIP file.
DownloadFile.LongHelp: Multiple documents are downloaded as a flat list or in separate folders in a zip file based on the admin settings.
EditFile.Title: Edit
EditFile.LongHelp: Select a document and click this command to download file and lock it for modification.
UpdateAndUnlock.Title: Update and Unlock
UpdateAndUnlock.LongHelp: Select the document and click this command to update and unlock a file.
LockAndDownload.Title: Lock and Download
LockAndDownload.LongHelp: Select a document and click this command to download file and lock it for modification.
OfficeWebEdition.Title: Edit
OfficeWebEdition.LongHelp: Select a MS Office document and click this command for modification.
Unlock.Title: Unlock
Unlock.LongHelp: Select the document and click this command to unlock file.
UpdateFile.Title: Update
UpdateFile.LongHelp: Select the document and click this command to update modification done in a file.
UndoEditFile.Title: Undo Edit
UndoEditFile.ShortHelp: Cancels Edit in a selected file
UndoEditFile.LongHelp: Select the document Which is currently being Edited and click this command to undo/cancel edit of the file.
FolderUpload.Title: Upload Folder
FolderUpload.ShortHelp: Uploads an entire folder, including its content and subfolders from your local system.
FolderUpload.LongHelp: The upload preserves the existing folder structure. When the Bookmark Folder name and the folder name are same, the contents of the folder are uploaded in the existing Bookmark Folder.
RemoveShortcut.Title: Remove Shortcut
RemoveShortcut.ShortHelp: Removes Shortcut of Bookmark Folder(s) from currently linked Bookmark Folder.
RemoveShortcut.LongHelp: Removes Shortcut of Bookmark Folder(s) from currently linked Bookmark Folder.
FolderDownload.Title: Download Bookmark Folder
FolderDownload.ShortHelp: Downloads the selected Bookmark Folder and all its documents as a ZIP file, preserving the Bookmark Folder structure.
FolderDownload.LongHelp: Only Bookmark Folders containing documents are downloaded. Bookmark Folders without documents and documents with multiple files are not supported.
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.Title: Copy Link
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.ShortHelp: Copy the Bookmark Folder link to the clipboard.
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.LongHelp: The command will copy the Bookmark Folder link to the clipboard and allow you to share it with others. Please note that access to the Bookmark Folder requires that your recipient has a 3DPassport, license and appropriate credentials.
ActionBar_Attributes.Title: Information
ActionBar_Attributes.ShortHelp: Opens the Information widget, and provides information about the selected objects like their properties (for example, their maturity state or owner).
ActionBar_Attributes.LongHelp: You can edit the properties of the objects from the Properties tab. Depending on the type of the selected objects, other tabs are available.
ActionBar_FindInCtxCmd.Title: Find in Context
ActionBar_FindInCtxCmd.ShortHelp: Find the objects connected to the Bookmark Folder or in a physical product.
ActionBar_FindInCtxCmd.LongHelp: Click on the command, enter the query and perform find to find the objects connected to the Bookmark Folder or in a physical product.
ColumnVisibility.Title: Table Preferences
ColumnVisibility.ShortHelp: Customizes the presentation of the tree display.
ExportCSV.Title: Export
ExportCSV.ShortHelp: Exports the contents of the Bookmark Folder as a CSV file.
ExportCSV.LongHelp: To select the columns you want to export, open the Tree List View Options.
ExpandAll.Title: Expand All
ExpandAll.ShortHelp: Expands all the children of the selected object.
ExpandAll.LongHelp: The parent nodes containing only one 3D shape are collapsed. You can expand them manually to display the 3D shape.
ExpandN.Title: Expand N Levels
ExpandN.ShortHelp: Expands N levels of the selected objects.
ExpandN.LongHelp: The parent nodes containing only one 3D shape are collapsed. You can expand them manually to display the 3D shape.
CollapseAll.Title: Collapse All
CollapseAll.ShortHelp: Collapses all the children of the selected object.
SelectAll.Title: Select All Visible
SelectAll.ShortHelp: Selects all visible objects in the structure.
SelectChildren.Title: Select Children
SelectChildren.ShortHelp: Selects all the child objects of the selected objects recursively. The selected objects remains selected.
SelectInversion.Title: Select Inversion
SelectInversion.ShortHelp: Selects all the objects in the structure except the branch of the object you selected.
SelectInversion.LongHelp: If you do not select an object first, this command selects all objects in the structure, except the root.
SelectLeaves.Title: Select Leaves
SelectLeaves.ShortHelp: Selects the leaves of the selected objects. Leaves are objects that have no child object.
SelectLeaves.LongHelp: Selecting the leaf objects cancels the selection of the object you selected.
SelectParent.Title: Select Parent
SelectParent.ShortHelp: Selects the parent of the selected objects.
SelectParent.LongHelp: Selecting the parent object cancels the selection of the object you selected.
SelectSiblings.Title: Select Siblings
SelectSiblings.ShortHelp: Selects the sibling objects. Siblings are objects that share a parent with the currently selected object.
SelectSiblings.LongHelp: Selecting the sibling objects cancels the selection of the object you selected.
tree-reorder.Title: Reorder
tree-reorder.ShortHelp: Reorders the direct children of Bookmark Root Folders or sub-Bookmark Folders
tree-reorder.LongHelp: The Bookmark Folder must have two or more direct children. You cannot reorder Bookmark Folder shortcuts.
tree-filter.Title: Filter
tree-filter.ShortHelp: Filter the root objects in the web app
tree-filter.LongHelp: Select the available options to filter the root objects of the structures.
findInTree.Title: Find
findInTree.ShortHelp: Searches for a Bookmark Folder inside a tree and expands the structure to a specific Bookmark Folder.
findInTree.LongHelp: If there are multiple instances, all the instances are expanded and highlighted.
ImportCSVBookmark.Title: Import Bookmark Folder
ImportCSVBookmark.LongHelp: Click on this command, select appropriate csv and click on OK to import the Bookmark Folder structure
Search.Title: Search
Search.ShortHelp: You can search for a document or an object and navigate to the Bookmark Folder to which the document is attached
Print.Title: Print
Print.ShortHelp: Prints the content of the viewer to the printer of your choice.
RelationIPExplorer.Title: Relations
RelationIPExplorer.ShortHelp: Opens the Relations app and displays the related objects by navigating relationships and paths.
thumbnailview.Title: Thumbnail
thumbnailview.ShortHelp: Displays each item as a medium-sized tile.
thumbnailview.LongHelp: This view is useful when you want to see information about each item in a comfortable format.
tileview.Title: Tile
tileview.ShortHelp: Displays each item as a small tile.
tileview.LongHelp: This view is useful when you want to see minimal information about each item in a compact format.
datagridview.Title: Table
datagridview.ShortHelp: Displays information in a table that contains one row for each item.
datagridview.LongHelp: This view is useful when you want to see the most detailed information about items, and to sort or group them based on this information.
Information.Title: Information
Information.ShortHelp: Opens the Information panel, and provides information about the selected objects like their properties (for example, their maturity state or owner).
Information.LongHelp: You can edit the properties of the objects from the Properties tab. Depending on the type of the selected objects, other tabs are available.
ActiveFolder.Title: Set/Unset Global Default Bookmark Folder
ActiveFolder.ShortHelp: Set or unset the Global Default Bookmark Folder
ActiveFolder.LongHelp: Click to define the Global Default Bookmark Folder for all commands supporting this functionality.
alphaSortingContainer.Title: Sort
alphaSortingContainer.ShortHelp: Lets you rearrange the browsing structure or browsing node.
alphaSortingContainer.LongHelp: Select the available options to sort objects of the structures.
